review.reviewBody: really good pizza,crust was super tasty  crunchy yet buttery and soft (some places crust taste  like cardboard but NOT this place.) I ate it UPPPPPpP. the cheese was good too not sure what blend they use or whatever , could have used more tho. the marinara sauce tasted homemade not too sweet or chunky but like actual tomatoes are in it , not corn syrup!! being from Chicago I'm a bit of a CONOSUIER ok this pizza is pretty good. again wish there was more cheese .….and wish it was a bigger pizza for the price but I guess that's showbusiness baby (capitalism)
It has been a while since we ordered from them, but it felt like inflation got them hard. It used to come with more filling. It is still savory and it's nice to have a brick oven taste to it.
Chef's Special Large is always amazing - especially stuffed crust!
Finally, a pizza place in Vancouver that actually covers the pizza with cheese! Create Your Own Pizza (Large)
Pizza tastes great but is incredibly small for the price. Added a teaspoon (small spoon) to the photo for reference. Not worth the price at all.
